text: @KellyO 100k Americans are dead from #COVID19 and 38 millions has filled for unemployment and Trump is golfing how sick is that ? Whete is the mefia outrage but you all want to report on Flynn distraction and Biden. Media stop failing us we are dying under Trump watch.
